lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras said on Monday Greece's economy was poised to show "exceptionally high" rates of growth, despite data showing that output had slumped more than expected in the fourth quarter of last year.
snippet: Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras said on Monday Greece's economy was poised to show "exceptionally high" rates of growth, despite data showing that output had slumped more than expected in the fourth quarter of last year....

headline.main: Greek Economy Slumps in Fourth Quarter, Hurt by Net Exports
headline.print_headline: Greek Economy Slumps in Fourth Quarter, Hurt by Net Exports
